scripts.build:frontends: npm run build -w apps/public-website && npm run build -w apps/client && npm run build -w apps/portal && npm run organize:dist
scripts.organize:dist: mkdir -p dist && cp -r apps/public-website/dist/* dist/ && mkdir -p dist/firmaplex-admin-panel && cp -r apps/client/dist/* dist/firmaplex-admin-panel/ && mkdir -p dist/client-portal && cp -r apps/portal/dist/* dist/client-portal/
